Hi there, I’m Marcus. I’ve spent most part of my adult years traveling and working as an IT-consult. Born and raised in a small Swedish town, live now days in Munich. Changing career to be part of this amazing community.

Here on my blog I share my experience and insights from the journey of becoming a better developer.
